data.message: can someone PLEASE help me, begging here.. ive done what i'm supposed to, tried everything else and im about to lose my mind!  i was forced to convert my personal account to a "page". i was told all my information would transfer and it did not, none of my pictures, previous posts or games =(  i followed all the instructions and sent in the ids and still, NO help in getting it back reversed to my personal page.  again, sorry to post here, but i'm about to go nuts. If anyone would look at my page, as it was (personal), you could see all my posts,pictures, etc from 5 years back and that i'm a "real person".  i got a really weird message i think friday while playing a game, blank white screen and couldnt get logged back in, did i get hacked?? please please i need my old page back!! thanks so much.
